job title: Marketing Campaign Analytics Data Scientist - Consumer Bank
job description:
As a member of the Marketing Analytics team, the Marketing Analyst is responsible for measuring the effectiveness of Chase’s retail marketing campaigns. The results and learnings from the analyses, which seek to quantify both statistical and practical significance, are used to drive future campaigns and to optimize Chase’s multi-million dollar annual marketing spend. This individual will work in a fast-paced environment, performing analysis, interpreting results, preparing final documents, and helping to present results to senior management.

Candidate must possess excellent analytical skills with a minimum of 5 years experience in applying statistical methods to business problems. Experience analyzing the results of marketing efforts is preferred, as is Banking or Financial Services experience.

Applicant must possess advanced technical skills, with at least 5 years experience with SAS, Business Objects, and SQL. Knowledge of visual techniques for data analysis and presentation is also required.

Candidate must have strong communication and presentation skills, with a demonstrated ability to effectively present results of complex analyses to senior management. Applicant should also have proven experience in a customer-focused role and building relationships with key internal customers.

A Master’s degree in a quantitative discipline is required.
